selectedVerses.text: and if he sees the sword coming upon the land and blows the trumpet and warns the people,
The wind blows to the south and goes around to the north; around and around goes the wind, and on its circuits the wind returns.
that struck the peoples in wrath with unceasing blows, that ruled the nations in anger with unrelenting persecution.
The grass withers, the flower fades when the breath of the LORD blows on it; surely the people are grass.
Behold, I have created the smith who blows the fire of coals and produces a weapon for its purpose. I have also created the ravager to destroy;
